headline: AstraZeneca, Daiichi build cancer drug case; Amgen invests $1B
summary: The two partners disclosed study results supporting an approval application for their drug dato-dxd. Elsewhere, Agenus cut spending and the U.S. PTO withdrew a controversial proposed patent rule.
